alert.note: Alert for San Rafael Swell (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 24 at 1:37PM MST until November 25 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches, mainly above 5000 feet. * WHERE...San Rafael Swell. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected along area roadways including I-70.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
